attributes.action: Make cancer one of the medical conditions that are allowed to claim exemption from prescription charges.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently while under treatment at a hospital any drugs used are provided free of any charges but once the initial treatment is over any further treatment to prevent the cancer reoccurring has to be paid for by prescription. This is unfair to many people who earn too much to be on benefits but are still not high earners.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
